quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the legendary rock band AC/DC, their electrifying music, and their influential presence in the world of rock and roll!
quizTags: AC/DC, Music, Rock, Hard Rock, Angus Young, Highway to Hell, Back in Black

questions.question: Who is the lead guitarist and co-founder of AC/DC?
questions.explanation: Angus Young is the lead guitarist and co-founder of AC/DC. His energetic stage presence and signature schoolboy outfit have become iconic symbols of the band.

questions.question: Which AC/DC album featured the hit song 'Highway to Hell'?
questions.explanation: The album 'Highway to Hell' by AC/DC, released in 1979, featured the hit song of the same name. The album was a commercial success and a breakthrough for the band.

questions.question: Which AC/DC album became one of the best-selling albums of all time and featured songs like 'Back in Black' and 'You Shook Me All Night Long'?
options: For Those About to Rock We Salute You
questions.explanation: The album 'Back in Black' by AC/DC, released in 1980, became one of the best-selling albums of all time. It was a tribute to their former lead singer Bon Scott and marked a new era for the band.

questions.question: Who replaced Bon Scott as the lead vocalist of AC/DC after his untimely death?
questions.explanation: Brian Johnson replaced Bon Scott as the lead vocalist of AC/DC after Scott's untimely death in 1980. Johnson's powerful vocals contributed to the band's continued success.

questions.question: Which AC/DC song begins with the iconic bell tolling?
questions.explanation: The AC/DC song 'Hells Bells' begins with the iconic bell tolling, creating a dark and memorable introduction to the track. The song is featured on the album 'Back in Black.'

questions.question: Which album by AC/DC includes the hit songs 'You Shook Me All Night Long' and 'Rock and Roll Ain't Noise Pollution'?
options: For Those About to Rock We Salute You
questions.explanation: The album 'Back in Black' by AC/DC includes the hit songs 'You Shook Me All Night Long' and 'Rock and Roll Ain't Noise Pollution.' The album remains one of their most successful releases.

questions.question: Which AC/DC song features the famous lyrics 'I'm TNT, I'm dynamite'?
questions.explanation: The AC/DC song 'T.N.T.' features the famous lyrics 'I'm TNT, I'm dynamite.' The song is a fan favorite and has become one of their classic hits.

questions.question: Which album by AC/DC was released as a dedication to their former lead singer Bon Scott?
questions.explanation: The album 'Back in Black' by AC/DC was released as a dedication to their former lead singer Bon Scott, who tragically passed away in 1980. The album's title represents a return to music and life 'back in black.'

questions.question: AC/DC was formed in which country?
questions.explanation: AC/DC was formed in Australia in 1973 by brothers Angus Young and Malcolm Young. The band's electrifying performances and hard rock sound quickly gained popularity.

questions.question: Which AC/DC album includes the song 'Thunderstruck'?
questions.explanation: The AC/DC album 'The Razors Edge,' released in 1990, includes the hit song 'Thunderstruck.' The album marked a successful comeback for the band in the 1990s.
